newsitem.title: PAKISTAN: Pakistan stocks end up on constitutional amendment.
newsitem.headline: Pakistan stocks end up on constitutional amendment.

text.p: Pakistani stocks jumped at Tuesday's close after the parliament passed a bill to curb presidential powers to sack a government and parliament, dealers said.
"This means that now the Nawaz Sharif government will complete its five-year term," said dealer Dawar Hasan. "It is a positive news and will bring stability to the elected governments."
The Karachi index rose 16.10 points, or 1.02 percent, to end at 1,590.80. Losers led gainers 147 to 108. PTCL rose 0.95 rupees to 29.70 and ICI Pakistan 1.30 to 25.20.
